student_addresses NC State University collects student address information through the student admission process
Home Address This address is used for mailing purposes and should describe the location where you would like to receive your mail
Permanent Address This address persists beyond the student’s attendance at the University. This may be a parent’s address or your permanent address.
Local Address This address should be the student’s physical living location while attending NC State and where you can be reached in an emergency
Campus Housing Address The student’s address in a University-managed residence hall or apartment
Diploma Address The address to which a student’s diploma should be mailed once the student graduates
SEVIS Local Address The student’s local address while you are at NC State, which is sent to SEVIS
SEVIS Foreign Address The student’s home foreign address
